targets.query: SELECT ip, top(mean, 5), router FROM (SELECT mean("count") FROM "hc"."vrouter.top" WHERE ("proto" = 'tcp' AND "dir" = 'src' AND "router" =~ /^$ROUTER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ip, router)
SELECT ip, top(mean, 5), router FROM (SELECT mean("count") FROM "hc"."vrouter.top" WHERE ("proto" = 'tcp' AND "dir" = 'dst' AND "router" =~ /^$ROUTER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ip, router)
SELECT ip, top(mean, 5), router FROM (SELECT mean("count") FROM "hc"."vrouter.top" WHERE ("proto" = 'udp' AND "dir" = 'src' AND "router" =~ /^$ROUTER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ip, router)
SELECT ip, top(mean, 5), router FROM (SELECT mean("count") FROM "hc"."vrouter.top" WHERE ("proto" = 'udp' AND "dir" = 'dst' AND "router" =~ /^$ROUTER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ip, router)
SELECT ip, top(mean, 5), router FROM (SELECT mean("count") FROM "hc"."vrouter.top" WHERE ("proto" = 'unknown' AND "dir" = 'src' AND "router" =~ /^$ROUTER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ip, router)
SELECT ip, top(mean, 5), router FROM (SELECT mean("count") FROM "hc"."vrouter.top" WHERE ("proto" = 'unknown' AND "dir" = 'dst' AND "router" =~ /^$ROUTER$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ip, router)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND src_ip != '' AND dst_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), proto, dst_port fill(0)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND src_ip != '' AND dst_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip fill(0)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND direction = 'ingress' AND src_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip fill(0)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND direction = 'egress' AND dst_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), dst_ip fill(0)

SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != '' AND proto = 'tcp' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)

SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND proto = 'udp' AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND proto = '' AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != ''AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), proto, dst_port fill(0)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip fill(0)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND direction = 'ingress' AND src_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip fill(0)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND direction = 'egress' AND dst_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), dst_ip fill(0)

SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != '' AND proto = 'tcp' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)

SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND proto = 'udp' AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)
SELECT sum(bytes) FROM "hc"."sflow" WHERE  tenant_name =~ /^$TENANT$/ AND proto = '' AND dst_ip != '' AND src_ip != ''AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), src_ip, dst_ip, direction fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vrouter.stats" WITH KEY = "router" WHERE router != ""
list.label: Router
list.name: ROUTER
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "vrouter.stats" WITH KEY = "router" WHERE router != ""
